mapper.insert: insert into channel_sale_recode (id, channel, goods_id, release_state, release_price, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{releaseState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{releasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update channel_sale_recode set channel = #{channel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, release_state = #{releaseState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, release_price = #{releasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, channel, goods_id, release_state, release_price, create_time, update_time from channel_sale_recode
